Buffalobarfly.com is your guide to restaurants in Buffalo, NY. You'll find everything from fast food&casual dining to find dining restaurants. Buffalo has a wealth of dining options with a wide variety of cuisines. 99 Fast Food Restaurant 3398 bailey ave Buffalo, New York 14215 (716) 836-6058
